instructions: Open Settings from the home screen. Tap Display . Tap Motion smoothness . How to change the Galaxy S20 refresh rate to 120Hz Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central Choose High refresh (120Hz) to switch to the 120Hz mode. Hit Apply to confirm the changes. How to change the Galaxy S20 refresh rate to 120Hz Source: Harish Jonnalagadda / Android Central
